[vc_row][vc_column][vc_custom_heading text=”Moonshine is a free and open source middleweight IDE built with ActionScript3 for AS3/Flex/FlexJS development with Cloud and Desktop support” font_container=”tag:h2 font_size:31px text_align:center” use_theme_fonts=”yes”][vc_empty_space height=”100px”][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column][vc_custom_heading text=”Why Moonshine” font_container=”tag:h2 font_size:31px text_align:left” use_theme_fonts=”yes”][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column width=”1/2″][vc_custom_heading text=”Works with feature parity on the cloud model” font_container=”tag:h3 text_align:center” use_theme_fonts=”yes”][vc_column_text el_class=”text-size-18″]

First ever IDE which provides cloud support for AS3 , Flex and FlexJS. Now you can create your projects on cloud and experience its strength. Start it now.

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/2″][vc_single_image image=”19″ img_size=”full” alignment=”center” css=”.vc_custom_1455878272835{padding-top: 20px !important;padding-bottom: 20px !important;}”][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column width=”1/2″][vc_custom_heading text=”100% Cross Platform” font_container=”tag:h3 text_align:center” use_theme_fonts=”yes”][vc_column_text el_class=”text-size-18″]Moonshine is a cross platform open source application. With Moonshine you will find the luxury of developing at anywhere on any platform.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/2″][vc_single_image image=”16″ img_size=”full” alignment=”center” css=”.vc_custom_1455798850778{padding-top: 50px !important;padding-bottom: 50px !important;}”][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column width=”1/2″][vc_custom_heading text=”Built specifically to focus on Flex and FlexJS” font_container=”tag:h3 text_align:center” use_theme_fonts=”yes”][vc_column_text el_class=”text-size-18″]

FlexJS is next generation Flex SDK with lot more capability. We are including potential of FlexJS which allows our MXML and Actionscript code to run in even more places than Flash currently does. For More information please visithttps://cwiki.apache.org/confluence/display/FLEX/FlexJS

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/2″][vc_single_image image=”18″ img_size=”full” alignment=”center” css=”.vc_custom_1455799270849{padding-top: 50px !important;padding-bottom: 50px !important;}”][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column width=”1/2″][vc_custom_heading text=”Subversion support” font_container=”tag:h3 text_align:center” use_theme_fonts=”yes”][vc_column_text el_class=”text-size-18″]

We are providing SLIKSVN for subversion support because they provide a standalone command-line Subversion client for Windows. The installer contains all command line tools (svn, svnadmin, svnsync, svnserve, svnmucc) but no application bindings nor Apache modules. For more information please visithttps://sliksvn.com/

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/2″][vc_single_image image=”23″ img_size=”full” alignment=”center” css=”.vc_custom_1455799394015{padding-top: 50px !important;padding-bottom: 50px !important;}”][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column][vc_custom_heading text=”Moonshine Desktop Features Adds” font_container=”tag:h2 font_size:31px text_align:center” use_theme_fonts=”yes”][vc_column_text el_class=”text-size-18″]
  • ANT build
  • FDB debugger for debugging support
  • TourDeFlex component for Flex learners
  • Mobile Application support
[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column][vc_custom_heading text=”What to expect in next release” font_container=”tag:h3 text_align:left” use_theme_fonts=”yes”][vc_column_text el_class=”text-size-18″]
  • Code Completion
  • Improved Debugger
  • More project templates
[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column][vc_custom_heading text=”Where you can Find source code” font_container=”tag:h3 text_align:center” use_theme_fonts=”yes”][vc_column_text el_class=”text-size-18″]

Moonshine sources are accessible to all and you can find it’s complete sources from here.

Try it now by installing Win/Mac installers Now.

[/vc_column_text][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/2″][vc_btn title=”Download (Windows)” color=”primary” align=”center” link=”url:http%3A%2F%2Fmoonshine-ide.com%2Fwp-content%2Fuploads%2FMoonshine.exe   target:%20_blank”][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/2″][vc_btn title=”Download (Mac)” color=”primary” align=”center” link=”url:http%3A%2F%2Fmoonshine-ide.com%2Fdownloads%2FMoonshineAppStoreHelper.pkg   target:%20_blank”][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column][vc_custom_heading text=”Requirements” font_container=”tag:h3 text_align:center” use_theme_fonts=”yes”][vc_column_text el_class=”text-size-18″]

Moonshine requires that user should have Apache Flex SDK and FlexJS SDK installed in order to use respective features.

Before you start, you are expected to have the following:

Apache Flex SDK (http://flex.apache.org/installer.html)

FlexJS 0.6.0 SDK

SVN (https://sliksvn.com/downlo ad/) – optional

ANT (http://ant.apache.org) (minimum version requirement is 1.9.2)– optional

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column][vc_custom_heading text=”Support the Moonshine Project” font_container=”tag:h3 text_align:center” use_theme_fonts=”yes”][vc_column_text el_class=”text-size-18″]

We have spent good amount of time and energy to bring this new exciting IDE to Flex community and there are many more features under progress to get added in next release. Moonshine is completely open source and we love your support in making it the best IDE for Flex|AS3|FlexJS users.

You can access our source code and help us improve the features. Interested developers can join our LinkedIn group at

https://www.linkedin.com/groups/8464960
